beerList.name: Tusker Lager
beerList.description: The taste is very grainy and malted barley, but all on the faint thin level. It has the feel of a regular lager, but not going to set the world alight, and truth be told it is a little boring to drink, light and thin, and has an overall flat taste to it all.

beerList.name: Pilsner Lager
beerList.tagline: Its all about the beer. Loose the carbs.
beerList.description: It is a type of light-colored lager that maintains its bright color while undergoing a process called “lagering” during production

beerList.name: Smirnoff Vodka
beerList.description: With its crisp taste and bubbly finish, Smirnoff Ice Original features natural lemon lime flavor. Lightly carbonated, Smirnoff Ice has a delicious citrus bite, along with a refreshing effervescence. Enjoy chilled and drink responsibly.

beerList.name: Hennessy
beerList.description: Overall, they have a classic brandy taste, with a sweet fruitiness similar to burnt wine mellowed by a pleasant oakiness. You'll find floral and fruit (particularly citrus) notes in these cognacs, and hints of spice, vanilla, and chocolate are common

beerList.name: Guiness
beerList.tagline: Good things comes to those who wait
beerList.description: Guinness is an Irish dry stout that originated in the brewery of Arthur Guinness at St. James's Gate, Dublin, Ireland

beerList.name: Budweiser
beerList.tagline: Where there's life, there's Bud. For all you do, this Bud's for you
beerList.description: Where there's life, there's Bud. For all you do, this Bud's for you

beerList.name: Heineken
beerList.description: Heineken is a high-quality European pale lager made from 100% natural ingredients. There are only three ingredients in this beer: barley, hops, and water. Overall it has a bitter, sweet taste with biscuity malt flavor and a hint of sweet corn and green apple, which make it intriguing.

beerList.name: Sierra Vodka
beerList.tagline: The only vodka made entirely in Lake Tahoe from 100% Sierra Nevada water.
beerList.description: Sweet aromas allude to the base grain of corn. Though the aromas are faint, the absence of flaws is remarkable.

beerList.name: Summit Lager
beerList.description: The taste is sweet and light, grain and mildly metallic with a little carbonation bite. The mouth feel is light bodied, oily with moderate carbonation. The aroma is of light cereal grains and syrup with a faint clean mouth feel to it.

beerList.name: Budlight
beerList.tagline: The perfect beer for removing 'no' from your vocabulary for the night
beerList.description: Bud Light is clean, crisp and ideal for hot-weather consumption. It tastes like a slightly alcoholic cream soda. It also positively crushes, sales-wise, every other beer in America
